- *This article is about the [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack") monster. For the role whose second rank title is "Ronin", see [Samurai](/wiki/Samurai "Samurai").*

A **ronin**, @, is a type of [monster](/wiki/Monster "Monster") that appears in [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack"). A ronin is a [strong](/wiki/Strong "Strong") [human](/wiki/Human_\(monster_attribute\) "Human (monster attribute)") monster that is very similar to a [samurai](/wiki/Samurai_\(player_monster\) "Samurai (player monster)") [player monster](/wiki/Player_monster "Player monster"), and fulfills a similar role.

A ronin has two weapon attacks.

## Generation

Ronin are not randomly generated, and are always created hostile. They only appear on the [Samurai quest](/wiki/Samurai_quest "Samurai quest"), where they act as a replacement for the hostile samurai that are encountered there in *[NetHack](/wiki/NetHack "NetHack")*.

## Encyclopedia entry

- *See the [encyclopedia entry for Human](/wiki/Human#Encyclopedia_entry "Human").*

* *This page is a **[stub](/wiki/Category:Stubs "Category:Stubs")**. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by [**expanding this page**.](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Ronin_\(monster\)\&action=edit)*

html:
Ronin (monster)

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
@ ronin (No tile)
Difficulty 12
Attacks Weapon 1d8, Weapon 1d8
@ ronin (No tile)
Difficulty 12
Attacks

Weapon 1d8, Weapon 1d8

Base level 10
Base experience 161
Speed 12
Base AC 10
Base MR 1
Alignment 3 (lawful)
Frequency (by normal means) 0 (Not randomly generated)
Genocidable No
Weight 1450
Nutritional value 400
Size Medium
Resistances None
Resistances conveyed None

A ronin:

  • has a head, a couple of arms, and a torso.
  • is omnivorous.
  • is not a valid polymorphable form.
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • is strong.
  • can pick up weapons and food.
  • can be seen through infravision.
Reference EvilHack - monst.c, line 4232
This article is about the EvilHack monster. For the role whose second rank title is "Ronin", see Samurai.

A ronin, @, is a type of monster that appears in EvilHack. A ronin is a strong human monster that is very similar to a samurai player monster, and fulfills a similar role.

A ronin has two weapon attacks.

Generation

Ronin are not randomly generated, and are always created hostile. They only appear on the Samurai quest, where they act as a replacement for the hostile samurai that are encountered there in NetHack.

Encyclopedia entry

See the encyclopedia entry for Human.

A '''ronin''', {{white|@}}, is a type of [[monster]] that appears in [[EvilHack]]. A ronin is a [[strong]] [[Human (monster attribute)|human]] monster that is very similar to a [[Samurai (player monster)|samurai]] [[player monster]], and fulfills a similar role.

A ronin has two weapon attacks.

==Generation==
Ronin are not randomly generated, and are always created hostile. They only appear on the [[Samurai quest]], where they act as a replacement for the hostile samurai that are encountered there in ''[[NetHack]]''.
